name: TECH FEST
description: TECH FEST MINERVA takes place on February 10, 2024, 9:30 AM - 4:30 PM at IIT Madras Research Park, Chennai. Register now!

name: BHARATEX EXHIBITION
description: BharatTex 2024: The World's Biggest Textile Event in India. February 26-29, 2024 at Bombay Exhibition Centre, Mumbai.

name: HACKATHON
description: Pillai HOC College of Engineering and Technology's Hackathon: 3-day national level event with a prize pool of over 1 lakh! March 14-16, 2024 at the college campus.

name: MECH ENGG CONFERENCE
description: International Conference on Advances in Mechanical Engineering (ICAME 2023) takes place on December 18-20, 2023 at SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Chennai.

name: FOOD PLAINT-BASED FACILITATOR
description: Become a WFPB diet ambassador! SHARAN's Whole Food Plant-Based Facilitator Training Program runs online Jan 18th - Feb 1st, 2024. Apply now!

name: HORTICULTURE FAIR
description: Don't miss the National Horticulture Fair 2024! See the latest trends in sustainable horticulture on March 5-7, 2024, at ICAR-Indian Institute of Horticultural Research, Bengaluru.

name: FOOD EXHIBITION
description: Join India Food 2024! Immerse yourself in a world of flavors, innovation, and networking on March 5-7, 2024 at Bangalore International Exhibition Centre.

name: PLANT-BASED LIFESTYLE WORKSHOP
description: SHARAN's customized plant-based lifestyle workshops - Learn the secrets to a healthier, more sustainable future. Contact us today!

name: Sports Event
description: Don't miss the exciting sporting event happening on December 12th, 2024 at Sport Hall!

name: Tournament
description: Join the Your Place Name Soccer Tournament for $15 entry fee, kick-off at 4 PM on August 15th!

name: marathon
description: Participate in the Any City Marathon on Sunday, August 27th, starting at 7:30 AM at 123 Anywhere St.! It features a half marathon, 10K run, and 5K fun run

name: Sports Event
description: Get fit for free at Your Fitness Present happening at River Park

name: Kali
description: exhibtion  of Kali's artwork,“Reverence” and Mon, 11 Mar onwards

name: Art Cafe
description: Unleash your creativity and enjoy a cup of coffee at Art Cafe.

name: ART GALLERY
description: Unleash your inner artist over a cup of coffee! ArtLife Gallery's ARTCafe lets you create your masterpiece while enjoying a relaxing atmosphere.  It starts Monday, March 11th onwards - sign up and sip your way to creativity!

name: 12TH EDITION- INDIAN ART FESTIVAL
description: The event is the 12th Edition of the India Art Festival. It takes place from February 8th to 11th, 2024, from 11 AM to 8 PM daily at the Nehru Centre in Worli, Mumbai.  This event showcases works from 45 galleries and 550 artists.

name: SAMARPAN-A INDIAN CLASSICAL DANCE
description: Celebrate the 11th edition of Samarpan, a tribute to Indian classical dance. Enjoy performances by renowned artists Medha Hari, Avijit Das, Annapurna Rithesh, and more. The event will be held on February 10th and 11th, 2024, at 5:45 PM onwards at Don Bosco Hall, Mangaluru.

name: ED SHEERAN CONCERT- + - = ÷ x TOUR
description: Ed Sheeran is performing in Mumbai, India as part of his + - = ÷ x Tour. The concert will be held on Saturday, March 16th, 2024 at 7:15 pm at the Mahalaxmi Racecourse. The concert starts at 3 pm with a performance by Prateek Kuhad, followed by special guest Calum Scott.

name: THE AMYRA DANCE ACADEMY'S CULTURAL FESTIVAL
description: Celebrate the rich tapestry of Indian culture! The AM RA Dance Academy's National Art & Cultural Festival showcases classical dance, music, art, acrobatics and more.  It's happening on Sunday, January 14th, 2024 at 4 PM at Lajpat Bhawan Auditorium in Delhi - don't miss it!

name: JANFEST-A MUSIC FEST
description: Experience a diverse blend of music at Janfest 2024, presented by the Indian Music Group.  The festival will be held January 25th to 27th at the IMC Auditorium in Ottawa, Canada.
